WorkItem.Description:
Whenever I try to load up the dpsdk module(through armory, loading a character file, or just switching from any other module to dps dk) I receive this error message and nothing happens.  
This is both on WPF and the web-based version of Rawr. 
 I have tried this on chrome, firefox, windows 7 and xp with the same results.
This is with the latest release.
 
== Version: 4.2.0.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

Comments.Message: Could you add the character file you tried. It's working fine for me.
I get the same error simply by creating a new DPSDK. (i.e. load Rawr, select create new character, change from bear to DPSDK)
